subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The House oversight committee subpoenaed Chuck Knoblauch after he failed to respond to an invitation to give a deposition and testify before Congress about his suspected use of H.G.H.
snippet: The House oversight committee subpoenaed Chuck Knoblauch after he failed to respond to an invitation to give a deposition and testify before Congress about his suspected use of H.G.H.
